name: The Rain (SuperSjoerdie)
description:
You might think all problems are solved when world peace is achieved, but if you were to think so, you'd be wrong...

The Rain is a 1 to 4 player co-operative zombie shooting game about a small group of survivors trying to pass through dangerous territory. The game has a short tutorial and one main level. There is built-in controller support for standard gamepads.

If you played the game, please let us know what you think in the comments! We can't wait to play all other games entered in this amazing jam!

Made by ThisSignGames, which currently only consists of one member. This is my second game.
